result.eng: The Vatican let it be known recently that...

result.eng: There are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ga: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann
result.orig: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá ann
result.html: Bíonn trí litir ag deireadh ainm gach comhaid chun a chur in iúl cén cineál comhaid atá annThere are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn trí litir ag deireaḋ ainm gaċ coṁaid ċun a ċur in iúl cén cineál coṁaid atá annThere are three letters at the end of each file name to indicate what type of file it is.

result.eng: The company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ga: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.orig: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shin
result.html: Ba cheart don chomhlacht seo a chur in iúl dúinn sé mhí ó shinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart don ċoṁlaċt seo a ċur in iúl dúinn sé ṁí ó ẛinThe company should have notified us of this this six months ago.

result.eng: The diagnosis was communicated to the applicant.
result.ga: Cuireadh an diagnóis in iúl don iarrthóir
result.orig: Cuireadh an diagnóis in iúl don iarrthóir
result.html: Cuireadh an diagnóis in iúl don iarrthóirThe diagnosis was communicated to the applicant.
result.ponchtml: Cuireaḋ an diagnóis in iúl don iarrṫóirThe diagnosis was communicated to the applicant.

result.eng: He made the prisoners aware of his power.
result.ga: Chuir sé a chumhacht in iúl do na príosúnaigh
